property.name: userLevelDocumentation
property.configure: Attribute specifying a title for a model or a component in a model. This attribute provides a visual title in the model, rendered more suitably for a title than a normal annotation. Moreover, if you export to web, this is used as the title for the containing component and for any exported web page. By default, the title is not shown on the web page except as part of the image of the model. If you wish for the title to also be shown in the HTML text before the image, then set the showTitleInHTML parameter to true.

property.name: prop:showTitleInHTML
property.configure: If set to true, then the title given by this parameter will be shown in the HTML prior to the image of the model (as well as in the image of the model, if it is visible when the export to web occurs). This is a boolean that defaults to false.

property.name: prop:fontFamily
property.configure: The font family. This is a string that defaults to "SansSerif".

property.name: prop:center
property.configure: A boolean parameter that controls whether the origin of the text is center (if true) or north-west.

property.name: prop:italic
property.configure: A boolean indicating whether the font should be italic. This defaults to false.

property.name: prop:bold
property.configure: A boolean indicating whether the font should be bold. This defaults to false.

property.name: prop:textColor
property.configure: The text color. This is a string representing an array with four elements, red, green, blue, and alpha, where alpha is transparency. The default is "{0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0}", which represents an opaque black.

property.name: prop:textSize
property.configure: The text size. This is an int that defaults to 14.
